Description: Handmade ovoid jar in deoxidised Nile silt with rounded rim, short straight neck and convex sides (bottom half missing). Decorated on exterior with a double row of lines incised around neck elaborated with punctate motifs; another double row of incised lines on shoulder; and a large frieze demarcated by three incised lines above and filled with incised diamond patterns infilled with punctate impressions.
Condition: Incomplete - much of the base is missing
